What is (are) High Blood Cholesterol ?,"Too much cholesterol in your blood is called high blood cholesterol. It can be serious. People with high blood cholesterol have a greater chance of getting heart disease. High blood cholesterol does not cause symptoms, so you may not be aware that your cholesterol level is too high.",NIHSeniorHealth,High Blood Cholesterol
